description:
Clean ending without the shadowy overlay of the playing band in that is seen at 00:20->00:50 and 00:51->01:16 in the regular credited and non credited version of the ending in episode 1-11.
This version is not used in any of the episodes and comes as creditless extra with the Blu-Ray volume 4.

titles.title: Non Teleop ED Kage Nashi Marumie Ver.
ノンテロップED影なし丸見えVer.
